title: 31 Mar Traditional Healer Services
cleaned_text: 31 Mar Traditional Healer Services [News](https://ltbbodawa-nsn.gov/category/news/) We're happy to announce that Traditional Healer services are resuming at the Health Department in April! We are bringing two Healers to our community: Mary Pine and Joseph Syrette. The Healers will see Tribal Community members by appointment. To schedule an appointment, call
